title: Tardive Dyskinesia - Static Apathy in Fast Forward (2012)
description:
Born from the ashes of Override, the Tardive Dyskinesia grappled with the freshest versions of progressive metal, baffling even the newly-formed math / experimental metal style with their particular musical temperament.
